text: Ledermanniella is a genus of flowering plants in the family Podostemaceae. There are at least 44 species all native to tropical Africa.Schenk, J. J., & Thomas, D. W. (2004). A new species of Ledermanniella (Podostemaceae) from Cameroon. Novon, 227-232. Species include: * Ledermanniella keayi (G.Taylor) C.Cusset * Ledermanniella letouzeyi C.Cusset * Ledermanniella onanae Cheek * Ledermanniella thalloidea (Engl.) C.Cusset ==References== Category:Malpighiales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ledermanniella
